item.description:
The weather for tomorrow nights flight (5/19) is forecasting rain so we have decided to move the fly out to May 26th, so please check your calender and RSVP if you can join us.

Hey everyone, it's time we got off our jump seats and got into the left seats!

How about we kick off Wednesday Night Flights with a trip for dinner to Marshfield... Not to bad, eh? We should be able to catch the sunset back if we leave promptly...

Let's see how we can start things off. The flying has been excellent.... Any other suggestions work too...

See you Wednesday. I'll be at my hangar, building 13 pre flighting....

http://www.airnav.com...

Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Dinner at Marshfield and maybe a Sunset flight home
